title: PlotSquared普通玩家没有权限买地皮
author: whiteyu1314
txt_content: 普通玩家没有权限购买地皮，只有op可以买，并且mangaddp default plots.use没用，求助qwq

replies.author: もぺもぺ
replies.txt_content:
/mangaddp Builder plots.use
/mangaddp Builder plots.plot.1        
/mangaddp Builder plots.permpack.basic

replies.author: skzs
replies.txt_content:
/mangaddp Builder plots.use
/mangaddp Builder plots.plot.1        
/mangaddp Builder plots.permpack.basic 
输入这些指令了吗？如果没有输入一下
